author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:
Update the FED/Crate mapping list based on [https://cmshcal.docs.cern.ch/hcos/crateFedMap/](https://cmshcal.docs.cern.ch/hcos/crateFedMap/ )


#### PR validation:
`cmsRun DQM/Integration/python/clients/hcal_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py` on recent data inputfile without errors and local DQM GUI shows desired changes: new FEDs are correctly plotted.
title: HcalDQM: Update hcal FED list for crate 3-FED readout
